name: github-small-prs-checker
title: GitHub Small PRs Checker
description: Monitors repositories for small pull requests
author: lazar_georgiev

commands.name: check-small-prs
commands.title: Check for Small PRs
commands.description: Check for small pull requests in configured repositories

preferences.name: maxLines
preferences.title: Maximum Lines
preferences.description: Maximum number of changed lines to consider a PR small (additions + deletions)

preferences.name: maxAgeDays
preferences.title: Maximum Age (Days)
preferences.description: Maximum age of PRs in days

preferences.name: ignorePatterns
preferences.title: Ignore File Patterns
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of regex patterns for files to not count towards the total changes (e.g., '**/package-lock.json')

commands.name: list-small-prs
commands.title: List Small PRs
commands.description: Show a list of small pull requests
